response.overview: The tradition of seniors in Slovakia – theft of a class-register containing grades and absences. This year, class Oktáva decided to do it through a video game, stealing from all the class teachers they have ever had – from Trenčín's most successful influencer MATYKÁR, through a teacher on maternity leave up to their current Italy-loving maths teacher.
response.title: Oktáva Steals the Class-register
